EmailTemplate.name: Account Status is Former Client
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Status has changed to Former Client for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello CS Leadership,
Account status has changed to Former Client on Account - {!Account.Name}.
https://livongohealth2ndorg.lightning.force.com/{!Account.Id}
This is an automated message, please do not reply.
Thank you,
Livongo Salesforce Team
